key_risks: Exposure to catastrophic events in Florida, including hurricanes
Regulatory challenges and rising reinsurance costs
Litigation risks from FLSA violations and labor disputes
High debt-to-equity ratio (0.51) raising financial leverage concerns
controversies: Lawsuits alleging unpaid wages and FLSA violations
Impact of Hurricane Ian (2022) on financial stability
environmental_issues: Indirect exposure to climate change risks due to operations in disaster-prone areas
social_issues: Labor disputes and allegations of unpaid travel time for workers
governance_issues: Regulatory scrutiny from the Florida Office of Insurance Regulation (FLOIR)
